EmailTemplate.name: 4/30/2014 Everbank Webcast.Travelport Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Stryder Attacknid Giveaway | Register & Attend to Win
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A VMTurbo Webinar Invitation Best Practices for Virtualization Management
How Travelport Leverages VMTurbo to Assure Performance in a Complex Environment – Including Cisco UCS We're Giving Away An Attacknid. Register to Win: http://bit.ly/1k9TQqW WHAT Webinar, followed by an Attacknid StryderTM Raffle
WHEN Thursday, May 1, 2014, 9-10 am PDT / 12-1 pm EDT / 5-6 pm GMT
FEATURING Steve Senecal, Director IT Datacenter Operations, Travelport Steve Corndell, Solutions Director, VMTurbo
Steve Senecal, Travelport’s Manager of IT Data Center Operations, manages Travelport’s 10,000+ VMs. Learn directly from Travelport’s experience about how VMTurbo was able to help them overcome challenges around complexity – specifically involving Cisco UCS – and recommendations for best practices in smarter virtualization management. Join this webinar to learn:
- How you, like Travelport, can optimize application performance while efficiently managing capacity
- The specific, increasingly complex technology challenges caused by Travelport's dynamic and growing virtual environment
- How Travelport uses VMTurbo to managing its largest-in-industry Cisco UCS environment
- And much more
All webinar registrants will be entered to win an Attacknid StryderTM robot! Register Now <http://bit.ly/1k9TQqW> Downloads White Papers Products 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
